name: Aurora Express: The Mechanic
description:
[Overview] 

As the sole passenger on the Aurora Express you find yourself on a treacherous path. It's up to you to keep the ship in working condition to ensure you arrive at your destination in one piece! 

[How to Play] 

  • Throughout the game different parts of the ship will begin to break, indicated by a red exclamation mark. 
  • As a part breaks its needed repair part will spawn somewhere one the ship, indicated by a yellow pick-up icon. 
  • Broken parts will deal damage to the ship over time, slowly dealing increased damage when left unnoticed. 

[Controls] 

  • WASD - Movement 
  • SPACE - Jump 
  • E - Throw 
  • F - Pick up/Fix 
  • ESC - Toggle Pause
